select ai.id, ai.merchant_id, ai.images, ai.create_date, ai.audit_status, ai.status_date, ai.introduction, ai.tag, mi.name as merchantName, mi.code as merchantCode, mi.address, mi.principal, mi.phone from audit_info ai left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = ai.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND mi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.merchantCode},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND mi.principal LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.principal},'%')
AND ai.audit_status = #{auditInfo.auditStatus}
AND mi.user_id = #{auditInfo.merchantId}
order by ai.create_date desc
